item.title: Membership commands
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Kalvin:

[quote]The substring should be 7 rather than 6.

Lol… The substring should be 8 not 7 because most people type t he space bar after the command
“bmember” thats 7 characters and the spacebar would be an extra one so make 7+1 = 8 LOL[/quote]
It was a simple miscount. No need to get all faggish.

item.title: Membership commands
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Yell command is:

    if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
		String text = command.substring(5);
			yell("["+playerName+"]:  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}

Read full topic

item.title: Membership commands
item.dc:creator: @yobytruk yobytruk
item.description:
@yobytruk wrote:

if (command.startsWith("BMember") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.donator = 1; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; yell("Congratualtions "+command.substring(4)+"You now have Bronze MemberShip."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } if (command.startsWith("SMember") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.donator = 2; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; yell("Congratualtions "+command.substring(4)+"You now have Silver MemberShip."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } if (command.startsWith("GMember") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.donator = 3; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; yell("Congratualtions "+command.substring(4)+"You now have Gold MemberShip."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

I made that code, so I don’t have to edit there account file all the time, but it doesn’t work. It just says “r Night crawla cannot be found or isn’t online” I have no idea where the “r” is from. So can some1 like have a look over my coding please.

Also I wanted to find a command for the ::yell command, I am going to have a look over the forums now but if anyone can post theirs it would be much appreciated.

Read full topic
